title: Two years or more
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prisoners - Rehabilitation
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prisons - Canada
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prison psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Prison psychology
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Canada - Social conditions
description: An inside look at a modern federal penal institution of the kind built during the past decade, showing improvements that have been made not only in the physical facilities for housing inmates but also in the treatment and training programs. Emphasis is now placed on rehabilitation of the individual rather than on punishment for his crime.
